discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM)

"Free to use
AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) and AWS Security Token Service (AWS STS) are features of your AWS account offered at no additional charge. You are charged only when you access other AWS services using your IAM users or AWS STS temporary security credentials. "


https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/introduction.html#:~:text=Free%20to%20use,temporary%20security%20credentials.

Selected Answer: B
AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM)

questions.question_text: Which AWS service is always available free of charge to users?
Which AWS service provides a relational database management system that is fully compatible with MySQL and PostgreSQL?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Amazon Aurora

Selected Answer: A
A. AWS Cloud Adoption Framework (AWS CAF)

Selected Answer: A
The AWS Cloud Adoption Framework (AWS CAF) leverages AWS experience and best practices to help you digitally transform and accelerate your business outcomes through innovative use of AWS. AWS CAF identifies specific organizational capabilities that underpin successful cloud transformations. These capabilities provide best practice guidance that helps you improve your cloud readiness. AWS CAF groups its capabilities in six perspectives: Business, People, Governance, Platform, Security, and Operations

questions.question_text:
A company wants to migrate its applications to the AWS Cloud. The company plans to identify and prioritize any business transformation opportunities and evaluate its AWS Cloud readiness.

Which AWS service or tool should the company use to meet these requirements?

discussion.content: D. Implement multi-factor authentication (MFA) for IAM user accounts.

Selected Answer: D
D. Implement multi-factor authentication (MFA) for IAM user accounts.

Selected Answer: D
D because S3 infrastructure is AWS responsibility

The answer is D.
In the given options, implementing multi-factor authentication (MFA) for IAM user accounts falls under the customer's responsibility. It is the customer's responsibility to set up and enforce MFA for their IAM user accounts, which adds an extra layer of security to prevent unauthorized access. This helps protect the customer's resources and data from potential security threats.

Selected Answer: D
D, no doubts

Selected Answer: D
D. Implement multi-factor authentication (MFA) for IAM user accounts.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is a customer responsibility according to the AWS shared responsibility model?

choices.A: Apply security patches for Amazon S3 infrastructure devices.
choices.B: Provide physical security for AWS datacenters.
choices.D: Implement multi-factor authentication (MFA) for IAM user accounts.
choices.C: Install operating system updates on Lambda@Edge.

questions.question_text: Which option is a pillar of the AWS Well-Architected Framework?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Cost optimization
"The Six Pillars of the Framework:
Operational Excellence
Security
Reliability
Performance Efficiency
Cost Optimization
Sustainability"
